meaningMnemonic: You hit your <radical>head</radical> on a <radical>tree</radical> and a <radical>knife</radical> falls out and <kanji>stab</kanji>s you. Ow! What the heck?! What was a knife doing in that tree?
readingMnemonic: There's nothing more dangerous than a tree that likes to <kanji>stab</kanji>, so you get your <reading>saw</reading> (さ) and start to saw it down. Trees that stab get sawed!
